steps.title: What type of interaction is this?
content: Choose one to begin.

steps.title: Appointment prep
content: Scheduled: Check PP for Consultation Form
Find the person in PP
Click Memos/Files
Scroll to Memos section
Find "Consultation Form"
Review Consultation Form (CF)
Check PP for Do Not Adopt (DNA)
If there is an alert for DNA, one should pop up when you open the Person record.
Also check memos for a DNA note.

buttons.label: Where is the CF in PP?
Where to check Do Not Adopt (DNA)?

steps.title: Walk in prep
content: Walk-in: Have the visitor complete the Consultation Form
Make sure all required questions are answered
PetPoint checked for Do Not Adopt (DNA)
If person does not exist in PP, you can create the record after meet & greet.

steps.title: Any concerning behavior?
content: Watch how the adopter interacts with the cat.

steps.title: Did they choose a cat today?
content: If they clearly chose a specific cat today, pick Yes.
If they are still thinking or no cat is going home today, pick No.

steps.title: Does the adopter already have a Person record?
content: From the main search, type their name and confirm if a record already exists.

buttons.label: How to create a Person record

steps.title: If the adopter is in PP, is contact info verified?
content: To edit: click the green pencil icon under the person's name next to "Details".

buttons.label: How to edit the contact info

steps.title: Wrap up – no adoption
content: If no cat was adopted, make sure the notes and future follow up are clear.
Add Future adopt memo if needed on the Person page
Upload consultation form to Person record
Update calendar with correct reason

steps.title: Checklist complete
content: All steps have been completed.
